parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected rapid deceleration and acceleration can cause loss of control, leading to accidents, and potentially result in serious injury or fatalities.
symptoms: sudden and unexpected rapid deceleration and acceleration
and difficulty holding a steady throttle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the regulator/rectifier can cause the motorcycle to shut off while in motion, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: the 30-amp fuse under the seat blows
the starter and fuel pump fail

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the motorcycle to malfunction, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: the motorcycle cuts off and loses power

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the regulator/rectifier can cause a fire, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: flames appear under the gas tank

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected throttle closure or power shut-off can cause the motorcycle to jerk forward or lose power, leading to loss of control, accidents, or injuries, especially when cornering or cruising at high speeds.
symptoms: The throttle releases in a downward shift position
the bike reacts as if the rider had just closed the throttle completely
the bike begins to engine brake hard
power shuts off and then comes back on abruptly
feels like the bike is stalling and then starts again
